actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from ACIR, Education, OMB.
Referred to Subcommittee on Intergovernmental Relations and Human Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Intergovernmental Relations and Human Resources

official_title: A bill to expand the membership of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations to include elected school board officials.

summary.text: Expands the membership of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations to include three elected school board officials from different States.

titles.title: A bill to expand the membership of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations to include elected school board officials.
